actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for an audit by the General Accounting Office of all gold owned by the United States.

summary.text: Provides for an audit by the Comptroller General, with the assistance of the General Accounting Office, of all gold owned by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an audit by the General Accounting Office of all gold owned by the United States.
